page.title: 10A Fish Farm - Ladock Valley.
page.content:
Mr. Gibbons and his family came to Three Acres Farm in January 1984. He {used to work on a fish farm near {Heathrow Airport.}He came to Cornwall because he wanted to run his own fish farming business.
At first he started selling{pondweed and he employed local children to gather and sort the weed. He sells fish as well now. The fish are bought from different places around the country and are sold to wholesalers.
He has many varieities of fish including{tench, silver rudd, golden {rudd and goldfish.}The fish are fed twice a day. They are kept in separate ponds with running water going through. The water comes from the {Tresilian River}which runs through the farm.
